alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Citrus, northern Sumter and northwestern Hernando Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Inverness Highlands North, or near Inverness, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Coleman, Arbor Lakes, Royal Highlands, Lecanto, Citronelle, Leisure Acres and Inverness Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northern, central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Sumter
